name: Remember (itch) (RRoux)
description:
Has it ever happened to you that you wonder, what happens to people in a coma?  Do you believe in second chances?  In this game we give our main character a second chance, making sure that if you manage to get out of the house, he will wake up from the coma and continue with his life.

Writer: @Dj_RRoux

Dialogues: @Dj_RRoux

Music: https://patrickdearteaga.com

the models went by assets.

Twitch: twitch.tv/rroux
